skillList.skillDesc: FL4K is joined by a loyal Jabber companion, armed with a Pistol. While accompanied by the Jabber, FL4K’s Movement Speed is increased. Hold F to issue an Attack Command, which will cause the Jabber to throw a Radiation Barrel at enemies.
FL4K cloaks, turning invisible. FL4K can fire 3 shots while cloaked, and each shot is automatically a Critical Hit. While cloaked, FL4K has increased Movement Speed and Health Regeneration.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Fade Away Critical Hit Damage: +200%
Cloaked Movement Speed: +25%
Health Regeneration: +3% of Max Health/sec
Cooldown: 45 seconds
Skill Duration: 15 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K’s Maximum Health is increased, and they constantly regenerate health.

Hunter Skill. After shooting an enemy, FL4K gains a stack of Furious Attack. For each stack of Furious Attack, FL4K’s Handling and Gun Damage are increased. Stacks decay after a few seconds.

skillList.skillDesc: Fade Away no longer ends after FL4K attacks, at the cost of Critical Hit Damage and Fade Away duration being reduced.

Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, Action Skill Cooldown Time is reduced. Whenever FL4K's pet kills an enemy, Action Skill Cooldown Time is reduced even more and Attack Command's cooldown is refreshed.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Allies Share 17% of FL4K's Health Regeneration

skillList.skillDesc: After Fade Away ends, FL4K’s pet will Taunt, drawing the attention of all enemies in a huge radius. For a few seconds after Taunting, the pet gains powerful Damage Reduction.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Pet Taunt Duration: 6 seconds
Pet Damage Reduction: +80%

skillList.skillDesc: When FL4K is in Fight For Your Life, their pet will attempt to revive them.
While moving, FL4K constantly regenerates health and gains Damage Reduction. While still, FL4K gains Gun Damage and Fire Rate.

Health Regeneration While Moving: 0.3% of Max Health/sec

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K’s Jabber evolves into a Beefcake, discarding its pistol and equipping a Shotgun. While accompanied by the Beefcake, FL4K gains increased Movement Speed and Maximum Health. When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Beefcake will summon a melee weapon to deliver a powerful attack that knocks enemies back.
The Health Regeneration and Movement Speed of Fade Away persists for a short time after the skill has ended.
While above half health, FL4K's Gun Damage and Movement Speed are increased.
When an enemy has no target or is attacking a different target, FL4K deals increased damage against them.

FL4K’s Jabber upgrades his gear and equips an SMG. While accompanied by the Gunslinger, FL4K gains increased Movement Speed and Critical Hit Damage. When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Gunslinger equips a Rocket Launcher to attack the target.
Successive hits on the same target increase FL4K's Critical Damage per hit. Unblinking Eye resets every 3 hits.
Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, FL4K and FL4K’s pet regenerate health for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Health Regeneration: +1.6% of Missing Health/sec
Rage and Recover Duration: 3 seconds

Health Regeneration: +3.2% of Missing Health/sec
Rage and Recover Duration: 3 seconds

Health Regeneration: +4.8% of Missing Health/sec
Rage and Recover Duration: 3 seconds

Health Regeneration: +6.4% of Missing Health/sec
Rage and Recover Duration: 3 seconds

Health Regeneration: +8.0% of Missing Health/sec
Rage and Recover Duration: 3 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K and FL4K’s Pet gain increased Damage when FL4K activates an Action Skill. If FL4K is at full health, the increased Damage is doubled.
FL4K is joined by a loyal Skag companion, which will increase FL4K's Damage. Hold F to issue an Attack Command, which will cause the Skag to vomit acid onto enemies.

FL4K creates a Rift at a target location, teleporting their pet through the Rift and dealing Radiation Damage to nearby enemies. Additionally, FL4K’s pet becomes irradiated, growing in size and dealing bonus Radiation Damage when it attacks. Using Gamma Burst while FL4K’s Pet is downed or dead will revive the pet at the targeted location with 30% of its health, but will double Action Skill Cooldown Time.
FL4K's Pet deals increased damage.
Increases FL4K’s Gun Damage and Action Skill Duration.
When FL4K’s pet attacks an enemy, the first melee attack is an automatic Critical Hit that deals increased damage.
While Gamma Burst is active, FL4K’s pet is surrounded by a Radiation Aura, constantly damaging all nearby enemies.
Whenever FL4K’s Pet deals damage, FL4K regenerates health for a few seconds. Whenever FL4K deals damage to an enemy, their Pet’s health is restored for a portion of the damage dealt.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Converts +1.0% of Damage Dealt into Pet Health
Health Regeneration: +0.4% of Max Health/sec

Converts +2.0% of Damage Dealt into Pet Health
Health Regeneration: +0.8% of Max Health/sec

Health Regeneration: +1.6% of Max Health/sec

Converts +5.0% of Damage Dealt into Pet Health

skillList.skillDesc: When FL4K's pet takes damage, the pet returns some of that damage to the attacker.
Hunter Skill. When FL4K’s pet deals damage, FL4K and their pet gain a stack of Frenzy. Each stack of Frenzy increases Damage. The stacks decay after a few seconds.
For the duration of Gamma Burst, Damage dealt by FL4K is increased.
Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, their Pet gains increased Movement Speed and Damage for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Pet Movement Speed: +12%
Pet Damage: +10%
Psycho Head On A Stick Duration: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: When FL4K takes damage, a portion of all damage they take is shared to their pet instead.

FL4K’s Skag evolves into a larger, Great Horned Skag which will increase FL4K’s Damage and Gun Damage. When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Great Horned Skag will charge at enemies and knock them into the air.
When FL4K or FL4K’s Pet kills an enemy while Gamma Burst is active, the duration of Gamma Burst is extended and pet damage is increased. These effects can stack up to 5 times.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Skill Duration: +3 seconds per kill
Pet Damage: +10% per kill

skillList.skillDesc: Increases the power of Pet Bonuses granted to FL4K.
When FL4K’s pet is at low health, it gains Damage Reduction and regenerates health. This skill has a long cooldown.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Damage Reduction: +30%
Health Regeneration: +40% of Max Pet Health
Mutated Defenses Cooldown: 15

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K’s Skag evolves into an Eridian Skag, which will increase FL4K’s Damage and Fire Rate. When FL4K issues an Attack Command, their Eridian Skag pulls nearby enemies in by generating a Singularity.
After using Gamma Burst, the Rift remains for the duration of the skill. While standing near the Rift, FL4K and their allies rapidly Regenerate Health.
All Damage dealt by FL4K and their Pet is increased. Additionally, the Maximum Health of both FL4K and their Pet is increased.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Pet and FL4K Damage: +5%
Pet and FL4K Maximum Health: +5%

Pet and FL4K Damage: +10%
Pet and FL4K Maximum Health: +10%

Pet and FL4K Damage: +15%
Pet and FL4K Maximum Health: +15%

skillList.skillDesc: While FL4K is at low health, a portion of all damage they take is shared to their pet instead.

Melee Override Skill. FL4K establishes dominance over an enemy, turning it into an ally for a short time. If the enemy is a Beast, the duration is doubled. While under the effects of Dominance, the target constantly loses health until it dies or the effect ends. Only one enemy can be dominated at a time. An enemy can only be dominated once.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Dominance Duration: 12 seconds
Target loses 2% of Max Health/sec

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K is joined by a loyal Spiderant companion, which will cause FL4K to constantly regenerate health. Hold F to issue an Attack Command, which will cause the Spiderant to charge into enemies.
FL4K sends forward 2 Rakk to dive-bomb enemies. This skill has multiple charges.

Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, they gain a stack of Interplanetary Stalker. For each stack of Interplanetary Stalker, they gain a bonus to all damage dealt. Additionally, they gain a unique stacking bonus depending on the type of enemy killed. Each unique bonus can stack up to 3 times. Each stack decays after a short time.

Human Bonus: +3% Action Skill Damage /stack

Beast Bonus: +2% Movement Speed /stack

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever FL4K scores a Critical Hit, there is a chance their Action Skill Cooldown is reduced.
While there are no enemies nearby, FL4K’s Weapon Handling and Critical Hit Damage are increased.
When FL4K’s Rakk damage an enemy, a portion of FL4K’s health is restored.
FL4K has a chance to fire an extra projectile per shot.

FL4K's Spiderant evolves into a Scorcher, occasionally dealing Incendiary Damage to all enemies nearby. While accompanied by the Scorcher, FL4K constantly regenerates health and gains Elemental Resistance. When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Scorcher will charge enemies.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Health Regeneration: +1.0% of Max Health/sec
Elemental Damage: +10.0%

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K sends forward additional Rakk.
FL4K’s Hunter Skills become much more effective and have a longer duration.

Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills a Badass or stronger enemy, they gain increased Critical Hit Damage, Gun Damage, and Handling for a long time. Additionally, they receive a cash reward from the Intergalactic Bureau of Bounty Hunting.

FL4K’s Spiderant evolves into a Countess, which will cause FL4K to constantly regenerate health and gain Damage Reduction. When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Countess will burrow underground and then emerge dealing Corrosive Damage in an area.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Health Regeneration: +1.0% of Max Health/sec
Damage Reduction: +5.0%

skillList.skillDesc: FL4K’s Rakk have increased Cooldown Rate, and gain an Additional Charge.
FL4K deals increased Critical Hit Damage, and enemies are less likely to attack them.
FL4K gains increased Gun Damage and Action Skill Damage.
FL4K gains a chance to score a Critical Hit with weapons against any part of enemies.
